MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AlternationCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating objects.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating objects.
The number of alternating objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和附加的属性，可以指定为两个或多个交替外观对象。The property and the attached property enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating objects. 例如，可以指定对于每个三个交替的背景色中。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third in an . 分配给每个中。The is assigned to each in the . 从 0 开始的、 递增时才执行减 1 和 0 然后重新启动。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果为 3，有七个中的对象下, 表列出每个项。For example, if is 3 and there are seven objects in the , the following table lists the for each item. |位置中 Position of in the || |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 有多种方法可用于指定不同的外观的交替对象。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating objects. 一种方法是将绑定中的属性或的到。One method is to bind properties in the or of the to the . 然后，可以使用来指定应将哪个值应用到具有特定值。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the that has a certain value. 此外可以使用触发器来根据的值的属性的值更改其。You can also use triggers to change the value of a property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例创建，它绑定到集合中的项进行分组。The following example creates a that is bound to a that groups the items in the collection. 该示例交替的标头的每个后台通过执行以下两种颜色之间：The example alternates the background for the header of each between two colors by doing the following: - 集为 2。Sets to 2. - 创建返回，具体的值取决于。Creates an that returns a , depending on the value of . - 将绑定的中到属性并提供。Binds the of the in the to the property and provides the . 请注意，上设置附加的属性，并且绑定使用若要获取其值。Note that the attached property is set on the , and the binding uses to get its value. 该示例还交替中的项的背景通过设置三种颜色之间上和绑定每个到。The example also alternates the background of the items in the between three colors by setting the on the and binding the of each to the . 在这种情况下，后台三种颜色之间交替。In this case, the background alternates between three colors. ，组项不会显示。The that groups the items is not shown. 有关如何对组项的信息，请参阅[How to： 排序和组数据使用 XAML 中的一个视图](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。For information on how to group item, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md). [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HeaderStringFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化标头，如果它显示为一个字符串。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果你设置或属性、忽略属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例创建按价格范围进行分组的项的集合。The following example creates a that groups a collection of items by price range. 转换器， `GroupByPrice`，返回高于每个项的价格是一个整数值。The converter, `GroupByPrice`, returns an integer value that is above each item's price. 例如，如果项的价格是介于 0 和 100 之间，则转换器将返回 100。For example, if an item's price is between 0 and 100, the converter returns 100. 该示例使用若要创建的字符串，包括每个价格范围的上限。The example uses the to create a string that includes the upper limit for each price range. 例如，在美国，低于 100 美元的项分组显示"少于 100 美元的项"标题下。For example, in the United States, items that are under 100 dollars are grouped under a heading that says "Items under $100". [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleHeaderStringFormat](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#groupstyleheaderstringformat)] 下面的示例演示`GroupByPrice`类，`PurchaseItem`类，并且集合的绑定到。The following example shows the `GroupByPrice` class, the `PurchaseItem` class, and the collection that the is bound to. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#groupstyledata)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#groupstyledata)]
